title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - "richly freighted"

content.question: In context, the phrase “richly freighted” (line 28) implies that

choices.label: characters’ flaws help make them human
riches always carry imperfections with them
all people carry the burden of personal anxieties

content.answer: characters’ flaws help make them human

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
